name: TetrisVS
description:
Arrow key to move. Up to rotate. Space bar to drop. | Website | Have an idea? Share it in the community with a post and it might be featured in the next update!

Fight in this commonly known puzzle game where friends and foes battle. Let the games begin!

How the game works:

  • TetrisVS uses its own bag randomiser. We call it VS-bag. It randomly generates a tetromino one time with additions.
  • TetrisVS follows NES/Gameboy Tetris rules. We have plans of adding hold, next chart, and Hard Drop.

This project is not affiliated with The Tetris Company.  The code will not be open source, nor copyrighted.
